Additional Paid-in Capital: adjustments to additional paid in capital other
Common Stock: common stock held in trust liquidation
Treasury Stock: treasury stock value acquired cost method

Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to parent

Other Equity Adjustments: cumulative effect of new accounting principle in period of adoption
stock redeemed or called during period value

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value new issues
stock issued during period value treasury stock reissued

Stock Repurchases: share repurchases related to employee stock based compensation awards
__unmapped__: adjustments to additional paid in capital from share based compensation and related tax effects
adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation and exercise of stock options
preferred stock including additional paid in capital member
